SEARCH
Package com.orders.cabinet.service

Class UpdateOrderService

java.lang.Object
com.orders.cabinet.service.UpdateOrderService
@Service public class UpdateOrderService extends Object
Service for handling and updating orders based on received events and requests.

This service listens for order events, updates orders' states, and communicates with external systems to confirm, complete, or cancel orders.

Since:
2024-07-19

  • Method Details

    • handleOrderReceivedEvent

      @EventListener public void handleOrderReceivedEvent(OrderReceivedEvent event)
      Handles the OrderReceivedEvent by adding received orders to the internal map.
      Parameters:
      event - the OrderReceivedEvent containing the received orders.

    • getOrdersWithOnlyNewStateByShopId

      @Async public CompletableFuture<List<OrderDTO>> getOrdersWithOnlyNewStateByShopId(String shopId)
      Retrieves and removes new orders for a specific shop.
      Parameters:
      shopId - the ID of the shop for which to retrieve orders.
      Returns:
      a CompletableFuture containing a list of OrderDTO representing the orders.
      Throws:
      NoSuchShopException - if no orders are available for the specified shop ID.

    • confirmOrder

      @Async public CompletableFuture<?> confirmOrder(String shopId, ControllerDTO controllerDto)
      Confirms an order by updating its state and processing it.
      Parameters:
      shopId - the ID of the shop where the order is located.
      controllerDto - the ControllerDTO containing order details.
      Returns:
      a CompletableFuture containing the updated state.

    • completeOrder

      @Async public CompletableFuture<?> completeOrder(String shopId, ControllerDTO controllerDto)
      Completes an order by updating its state and processing it.
      Parameters:
      shopId - the ID of the shop where the order is located.
      controllerDto - the ControllerDTO containing order details.
      Returns:
      a CompletableFuture containing the updated state.
